original_text: And the hand of the people of Israel pressed harder and harder against Jabin the king of Canaan, until they destroyed Jabin king of Canaan.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 손이 가나안 왕 야빈을 점점 더 눌러서 마침내 가나안 왕 야빈을 진멸하였더라

sentences.original_text: And the hand of the people of Israel pressed harder and harder
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성의 손이 점점 더 강하게 압박하여

sentences.original_text: against Jabin the king of Canaan,
until they destroyed Jabin king of Canaan.
